description: Try our easy to follow The Lion King Paw Print Pancakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet pancake,Pescatarian,Banana,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Raspberry,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: The Lion King Paw Print Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk milk, butter, egg and vanilla together in a jug. Sift flour and bicarbonate of soda into a bowl. Stir in sugar. Make a well in the centre. Add milk mixture. Whisk until just combined.
Divide batter into 2 portions. Mix cocoa into 1 portion and transfer into a squeeze bottle.
Heat a large nonstick frying pan over medium heat. Brush pan with a little butter.

Using the cocoa batter, draw the outline of a paw into the pan and add dots for paw prints inside the outline. Allow to set slightly, about 20 seconds, then fill with plain batter. Cook for 3 minutes or until bubbles appear on the surface. Turn and cook for 2 minutes or until cooked through. Transfer to a plate and cover loosely with foil to keep warm. Repeat with remaining batters, brushing pan with butter between batches. Serve pancakes with fresh fruit.
